issue.title: [CF 1006] Missing timer text when icon in 'all absent' state.
issue.body:
Hi,

what I want to achieve is a debuff icon for corruption. When target doesn't have the debuff, the icon just should be shown.
When the debuff is applied to the target, the icon shouild fade-out and when the duration of the debuff is at 30%, the icon has to appear again.
I got this working, but when the icon appear at 30% duration it doesn't has a timer text anymore.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SType^Sbuff ^SAlpha^N0.5 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^S146739 ^SUnitConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SDEBUFFPERC ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S>= ^SName^S146739 ^SLevel^N30 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SCustomTex^S146739 ^SEnabled^B ^SOnlyMine^B ^t^N71204^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Hope you can fix this,

cheerz lore


> Posted by CurseForge user loredeluxe | Imported from CurseForge issue #1006 | Raw

comments.body:
Not a bug. You're using unit conditions to do the checking of the duration of Corruption. Once those unit conditions fail, your target is removed from the list of valid units that the icon will check, so it can no longer get data about corruption on your target. You need to use regular conditions for this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Not working at all with normal conditions:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SType^Sbuff ^SAlpha^N0.5 ^SUnitConditions^T ^N1^T ^SName^Saaa ^t^t^SName^S146739 ^SUnit^Starget ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SCustomTex^S146739 ^SOnlyMine^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SDEBUFFPERC ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S>= ^SLevel^N30 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SEnabled^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^t^N71204^S`| ^Sicon^^

I know that this was previously working at the beginning of MOP.


> Posted by CurseForge user loredeluxe

Your condition is severely flawed. It isn't checking for anything (you left the Debuff to Check field blank) and it is checking on yourself (but you can't cast Corruption on yourself).

Sorry, that was a copy+paste error:

Now icon is shown at 40% opacity when debuff duration is between 100-31%. When debuff is absent and under 31% nothing is shown :-/

Edited Oct 23, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user loredeluxe

Your initial question said nothing about showing it at reduced opacity - you wanted it to "fade-out", which I assumed meant that you wanted it to hide based on the fact that you wanted it to "appear again" upon reaching 30% duration (implying it was hidden before then).

It is showing at 40% while present and the conditions aren't failing. It is showing at 0% when the conditions are failing (which includes when the debuff is absent, since 0% is not >= 30%). The 100% opacity when absent is never used because the conditions are always failing when it is absent.

It sounds to me like this is what you are trying to do:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SConditionAlpha^N0.4 ^SUnit^Starget ^SType^Sbuff ^SUnitConditions^T ^N1^T ^SName^Saaa ^t^t^SName^S146739 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SDEBUFFPERC ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S< ^SUnit^Starget ^SLevel^N30 ^SName^S146739 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SCustomTex^S146739 ^SEnabled^B ^SOnlyMine^B ^t^N72007^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

If it is not, then please be much more clear about exactly what you want.
